name: Google - Derpy Hooves
description:
Change your Google logo and background with some Derpy!
(Floating cloud moving with her)

user.name: MKody
user.about: I'm 16, an Brony and I'm from Switzerland. I love web technologies and I'm a Twitter addict. I've got a Tumblr too ! Oh, and sorry for my bad english, I speak french.
